'''Beta 1.20.30.25''' (Android) or '''Preview 1.20.30.25''' (Windows, iOS, iPadOS, Xbox) is the tenth and final beta, and ninth and final ''Preview'' version for [[Bedrock Edition 1.20.30]], released on August 31, 2023,<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/19058164220557-Minecraft-Beta-Preview-1-20-30-25|title=Minecraft - Beta & ''Preview'' 1.20.30.25|website=Minecraft Feedback|date=August 31, 2023}}</ref> which fixes bugs.

== Fixes ==
*Fixed an issue where a boat wouldn't be placed on the water if the block underneath the water was highlighted.
*Fixed a bug in Education mode that prevented summon NPC commands from working if the users did not have {{cd|worldbuilder}} permission when the base version of the world was before [[Bedrock Edition 1.19.80|1.19.80]].</onlyinclude>
